org.sql: SELECT spree_products.id FROM spree_products INNER JOIN spree_products_taxons ON spree_products_taxons.product_id = spree_products.id WHERE spree_products.deleted_at IS NULL AND spree_products_taxons.taxon_id = "$1" GROUP BY spree_products.id HAVING COUNT(spree_products.id) = 1

rewrites.sql: SELECT spree_products.id FROM spree_products INNER JOIN spree_products_taxons ON spree_products_taxons.product_id = spree_products.id WHERE spree_products.deleted_at IS NULL AND spree_products_taxons.taxon_id = "$1" GROUP BY spree_products.id HAVING COUNT(spree_products.id) = 1 LIMIT 1
